content.raw:
I did a quick performance comparison to make sure the graph is not hurting us. In both cases, I took a sample from close to 1 min sim time. It would be more informative to get accumulated data over time though.

## `levels`

![profiler_levels.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/136601217-profiler_levels.png)

## `levels_factory`

![profiler_levels_factory.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3672539672-profiler_levels_factory.png)

---

At least we can see that there's not much difference, `SimulationRunner::UpdateSystems` took 0.226 ms on this branch, versus 0.223.
content.html:
I did a quick performance comparison to make sure the graph is not hurting us. In both cases, I took a sample from close to 1 min sim time. It would be more informative to get accumulated data over time though.

levels

levels_factory

At least we can see that there's not much difference, SimulationRunner::UpdateSystems took 0.226 ms on this branch, versus 0.223.
